Description: Tiraz fragment woven in linen; one edge preserved, not reinforced; two other edges/ends folded on a few centimetres and sewn (hemming stitches): one is decorated with twisted fringes sewn after the hem was made; other end ragged; a few millimetre from the fringed end is a decorative band showing brown stylised vegetal interlacing edged by two blue lines, embroidered in brown and blue silk (cross and chain stitches). Warp: linen, undyed, Z, 16/cm Weft: linen, undyed, Z, 13/cm
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
